p: All in vitro and in vivo experiments were performed in three replicates. All results were determined as mean ± SEM. The Student’s t-test and one way ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s post hoc multiple comparison test was used. p ≤ 0.05 were considered as significant. Linear regression was used to calculate IC 50 for % DPPH, ABTS, α-amylase, and α-glucosidase inhibition against the different concentration of test samples by means of Excel program 2007.
